snippet.title: Adrift Program - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
"Supply energy to many spaceships in this small, chill resource and time management game.
A Cooked-Like, if you will!"

Bobby is finally here to supply and satisfy!
Handle machinery and various energizing items in this short Overcooked-inspired indie game!

🎮 itch.io: blawnode.itch.io/adrift
💨 Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2606610/Adrift_Program/
💬 Discord: discord.gg/f8VcqhrFFM
🐤 Twitter: twitter.com/AdriftProgram

Game made by Team Adrift Program: Blawnode, redsti, NoStereo, KingKelpo, sound_digitator and Nazsgull.
Video edited by Blawnode:  @blawnode  
Music made by NoStereo: nostereo.carrd.co
